# quantityType

**Instance Property**

The quantity type for this sample.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var quantityType: HKQuantityType { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a reference to the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSample/sampleType] property that is cast as an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType] object.

## Getting Property Data

- **quantity**: The quantity for this sample.
- **count**: The number of quantities contained in this sample.

items.description: The number of quantities contained in this sample.
